adverse_reactions: ADVERSE REACTION DISTRIBUTED BY: Wal-Mart Stores, Inc., Bentonville, AR 72716 PLASTIC TUBE how2recycle.info Made in the USA with 90% OR MORE US PARTS Factory Certified
dosage_administration: Directions wet face, apply to hand, massage face gently. Rinse well. Use up to twice daily avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, flush thoroughly with water.
indications: Uses for the treatment of acne
